__e: You're not running away from who you are.
I'm not running away, not from what i can do and not from where i make my life.
Oh, mother, please, I'm not running off and there's no mystery.
For I must now remain hidden from the authorities, from people who would harm me, from people who would seek me out as a story.
You're running away from things that hurt you.
I usually steer clear of your kind.
